name: image-captioner-chrome-extension
description: TensorFlow.js chrome extension for captioning images on the web

scripts.copy: copy src/content.js dist/src/content.js && copy src/imagenet_classes.js dist/src/imagenet_classes.js
scripts.build: parcel build src/background.js -d dist/src/ -o background && npm run copy
scripts.watch: npm run copy && parcel watch src/background.js --hmr-hostname localhost -d dist/src/ -o background

author: Alexandra Babicheva <aababicheva_1@edu.hse.ru>
